alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 3:41AM CST until January 31 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...An additional round of freezing rain and sleet are expected this afternoon through Wednesday morning. Ice accruals should be less than a quarter inch. Sleet accumulations should be less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern into Central Arkansas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions. Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages.
